question: What is the best wish and hope when your friend graduated from school?

answerOptions.answer: I hope you win the contest
I hope you succeed someday.
I wish you happiness.
I hope you`ll get better soon.

question:
Rahma: What`s going on? You look sad.
Tony: My father has a debt, a very big debt, and we must pay it next week. 
Rahma : Oh my God. I hope your family can fix this soon.
Tony: Thank you
Which sentence expresses wish and hope?

answerOptions.answer: What`s going on?
Oh my god.
I hope your family can fix this soon.
Thank you.

question: What is the best wish and hope when your friend is sick?

answerOptions.answer: I hope you`re having fun there.
I hope you die soon.
I hope you`ll get better soon.
I hope you will come home soon.

question:
Chandra: Wow, that house is so big.
Rania: Yeah. It looks beautiful.
Chandra: I wish I lived in a big house.
Rania: Me too.
From the 3rd line of dialog, it can conclude that…

answerOptions.answer: Chandra`s house right now is not really big.
Rania wants to live in a big house with Chandra.
Chandra wants to build a big house.
Rania will move to a big house.

question:
Dara: What happened with your hands?
Farel: I had a car crash yesterday.
Dara: I`m sorry to hear that. Why is that happen?
Farel: It`s my fault. I wish I hadn`t driven at high speed.
From the dialog above, it can conclude that….

answerOptions.answer: Farel had a car crash with Dara.
Farel hurt his hand because he was driving a car.
Farel regrets that he had a car crash.
Farel wishes to be able to turn back time and avoid a car accident.
